nodes.title: Fix crash (possible due to Android Q) on album art modification
Big widget get white control button to be seen on more album art
Remove white line around app icon (lot of pixelation)
#294: restore default filenames when a tag is missing
add french translation for new skipped song playlist feature
Change the app ID for CI builds, so that CI flavor and official one can co-exist
Change APK name, mainly to help debugging/comparing during development
Smaller icon for cleaner look in round mode
Adding song position in an album to help when moving song in playlist queue
Playlist detail view as a layout problem
Popup menu for material-cab will follow theme
Appshortcut follow correctly the choosen theme
Player progress bar take all screen
Cleaner drag indicator in playlist layout
Small french correction after more usage
Fix the artist page display where the artist name is wrong if he/she is involved in multi-artists album
Dont show the song count as playlist decoration
Update dependencies and a deprecation fix
fix playing wrong song when restoring to play queue
fix album tag editor deleting 'artist' tag if 'album artist' is empty
updated German translation: removed Unicode escape sequences
Use deezer for fetching artist images
Add startup splash screen - fix white flash
Add play queue progress to up next
Update status bar icon to match app icon
Place the not played tracks first in the not recently played list
Begin to work on Android Auto pagination
Add Polish translations for untranslated strings
Fix audio cover fallback list to include "folder.png"
Set imageText visibility to INVISIBLE from GONE to allow reordering current song in queue
Better menuItem visual queue for delete action
English traduction for CA and GB removal
tweak song sorting for Song and Genre tabs
Fix crash if the songs/albums collection is empty
Prevent repeating last track when gapless is enabled (fixes #435)
Fast scroll popup: Show relative date for recent ones
When parsing release year from metadata, only consider the first `yyyy` part
Playing hide and seek with jaudiotagger - contain the VerifyError with FLAC
Fix crash on tapping/dragging the very fist item of the orderable playlist
Fix NPE on artist name splitting
Flush the Discog task queue on stop
Try to contain impact of exception thrown by AudioFileIO.read
Fast forwad was not put on flat palyer
Avoid crash on reading MP3 tags on Nougat
Switch theme based on OS setting
Add Feature: send lyrics to car audio when connected via bluetooth
Fix sleep timer not applied if gapless enabled
Fix RG not applied if gapless is enabled
Update underlying libraries and build tools
Optimization: Dont open the audio file again in ReplayGainTagExtractor
Add "delete from device" choice menu in playlist view (both dumb and smart ones)
Make it possible to type a time in the sleep timer
Skip to the next track when the currently playing one has an error
Add a confirmation dialog to avoid adding duplicate items to playlists
Fix lost play history on rescan
Fix: Feature artist page shows full albums, not just the slice he is part of
Fix regression: Albums with same name/same artist may be split by MediaStore -> merge them back
Fix crash when a song is removed from queue
Fix bug where Discog can be instantiated multiple times
Fix: crash due to iterating on a modified collection
Add build info in the version string (to ease debug and regression check)
Attempt to fix a crash after extended sleep
French trad for track and disc number
Apply Uri.encode on the album's metadata before submitting to web search
Remove songs from detail activities after they are deleted
